mentioned_cpes: SIMATIC ET 200M IM 153-4 PN IO HF
SIMATIC ET 200M IM 153-4 PN IO ST
SIMATIC IPC Support, Package for VxWorks
issue_name: Denial of Service Vulnerability in PROFINET Devices via DCE-RPC Packets

1.description: Update Development/Evaluation Kits for PROFINET IO: EK-ERTEC 200 to V4.5 Patch 01.

2.description: Update Development/Evaluation Kits for PROFINET IO: EK-ERTEC 200P to V4.6.

3.description: Update PROFINET Driver for Controller to V2.1 Patch 03.

4.command: Update to V6.1.2 or later version
4.description: Update SCALANCE M-800 family, RUGGEDCOM RM1224 family, SCALANCE M804PB, SCALANCE M812-1 ADSL-Router family, SCALANCE M816-1 ADSL-Router family, SCALANCE M826-2 SHDSL-Router, SCALANCE M874-2, SCALANCE M874-3, SCALANCE M876-3, SCALANCE M876-4, SCALANCE S615 family to V6.1.2 or later version.

5.description: Create a firewall rule that blocks the PROFINET Context Manager port (34964/udp).

6.description: Update SCALANCE W-700 IEEE 802.11n family to V6.4.

7.description: Update SCALANCE X200-4P IRT, SCALANCE X201-3P IRT, SCALANCE X201-3P IRT PRO, SCALANCE X202-2IRT, SCALANCE X202-2P IRT, SCALANCE X202-2P IRT PRO, SCALANCE XF201-3P IRT, SCALANCE XF202-2P IRT, SCALANCE XF204-2BA IRT, SCALANCE XF204IRT to V5.4.2.
